title: Volvo Group - global number of employees 2003 to 2018
summary: In general Number of employees has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Number of employees, of value 101700.0 was reached at Year 2007
The lowest Number of employees, of value 90208.0 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: Overall Number of employees has decreased over the Year.
